about_the_game:
So what is it about?
The game tells the story of two brothers, Fox and Dax, who escaped a brutal ambush in their village of Isgana, the last human metropolis that stood in the way of the dark king Bokrieg, who drained all color from the lands and covered the world in darkness. This cycle repeats itself so often until the evil disappears from the landscape and that evil always boils over in 18 years. It's time to end this cycle once and for all.

You walk with a teammate through a huge world called Isgroid, complete tasks, solve puzzles, fight dark enemies, rest by the fire, cook potions and most importantly, creatively color the whole world.

We drew inspiration from titles like Kingdom Come: Deliverance, The Witcher 3, Dark Souls, and It Takes Two while creating the video game, but still brought a fresh twist and ideas to the game that will definitely engage players.


The army that never ends!
Along the way through the landscape of Isgroid, there are also those who would like to take something from the players, or worse, hurt or kill them.
The main nail in your heel will be Bokrieg's army, supported by his family members, therefore it is necessary to gain strength and properly equip yourself, and it is only up to the player what to wear and adjust to the character, from socks to a helmet.


Fun co-op where the tension escalates!
Choose the right equipment, tactics and speed, both characters are original in their characteristics, so you always get something different. Collect glowing perk points to unlock cool abilities, notes all over the game world, mix potions to give you speed, and more.

GAME FEATURES

  • Semi-open world rich to explore, rewarded as you deserve, why not try the reward wells..

  • Create creatively with the help of your brush beautiful pictures, simple shapes and everything you can think of :-)

  • Collect valuable equipment, from head to sock, leave nothing to chance, each level will reward you with something

  • Cooperation is a key point to a great gameplay

  • Improve your abilities in three groups of perks for each player, whether it's a silent pass or a duel, we've got you covered

  • A rich story, full of twists and secrets that you will gradually uncover

  • Combat system inspired by KCD and Dark Souls games
